name: name-relation
title: Name Relation
description: A directed nomenclatural name relation. See #name-relations for examples and definitions.

fields.name: nameID
fields.title: nameID
fields.description: The subject name this relation originates from. Refers to an existing Name.ID or NameUsage.ID within this data package.

fields.name: relatedNameID
fields.title: relatedNameID
fields.description: The object name this relation relates to. Refers to an existing Name.ID or NameUsage.ID within this data package.

fields.name: sourceID
fields.title: sourceID
fields.description: Optional identifier for the source this record came from as listed in the metadata.yaml

fields.name: type
fields.title: type
fields.description: The kind of directed nomenclatural relation.

fields.name: referenceID
fields.title: referenceID
fields.description: The reference or nomenclatural act where this nomenclatural relation was established.

fields.name: page
fields.title: page
fields.description: The exact single page number where the nomenclatural relation was published in the linked reference. If the value spans multiple pages, the first page should be given.

fields.name: modified
fields.title: modified
fields.description: UTC timestamp in ISO format to represent the time the record was last modified.

fields.name: modifiedBy
fields.title: modifiedBy
fields.description: Author identifier indicating the person who has last modified the record.
